alternative_parents.description: Benzoic acids carrying a halogen atom at the 4-position of the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: 4-halobenzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Organic Compounds containing a benzene ring which bears at least one carboxyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Benzoic acids

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an acyl moiety of benzoic acid with the formula (C6H5CO-).
alternative_parents.name: Benzoyl derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bromine atom attached to a benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: Bromobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl bromide functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl bromides

alternative_parents.description: Carboxylic acids containing exactly one carboxyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Monocarboxylic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a carboxylic acid group with the formula -C(=O)OH.
alternative_parents.name: Carboxylic acids

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organooxygen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a bromine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organobromides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
class.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as halobenzoic acids. These are benzoic acids carrying a halogen atom on the benzene ring.

direct_parent.description: Benzoic acids carrying a halogen atom on the benzene ring.
direct_parent.name: Halobenzoic acids

intermediate_nodes.description: Benzoic acids or derivatives carrying a halogen atom on the benzene ring.
intermediate_nodes.name: Halobenzoic acids and derivatives

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing a carboxylic acid substituent attached to a benzene ring.
subclass.name: Benzoic acids and derivatives

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
